title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 691.24 - Compensation of attorneys representing claimants against Lawyer's Fund for Client Protection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 691.24 - Compensation of attorneys representing claimants against Lawyer's Fund for Client Protection

State Regulations

No attorney shall charge a fee for or
accept compensation for representation of claimants against the Lawyer's Fund
for Client Protection of the State of New York except as approved by the
trustees of the fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
691.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
